11.SummaryEnglish: Ami befriends Mamoru's colleague Natsumi, a widow who is trying to restore a classic car.

12.TitleEnglish: Aiming for the Top: The Pretty Swordswoman's Dilemma
12.SummaryEnglish: A young ignored warrior girl attempts to pursue her dream as the strongest warrior in Japan, that is until Tigers Eye attempts to destroy her dream mirror.

13.TitleEnglish: We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians
13.SummaryEnglish: Fisheye targets the fashion designer Yoshiki Usui, while Usagi hopes to persuade the designer to make her a wedding dress for free.

14.TitleEnglish: Storm of Love: Minako's Grand Two-Timing Plan
14.SummaryEnglish: Trouble stirs up when both Tigers Eye and Hawks Eye go after the same dream mirror, Minako's.

15.TitleEnglish: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You
15.SummaryEnglish: The girls become interested in an apparently antisocial old woman after she takes Diana into her home.

16.TitleEnglish: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation
16.SummaryEnglish: Reports begin to flood in of a Pegasus wreaking havoc in the city. Meanwhile, a popular boy shows an interest in Chibiusa.

17.TitleEnglish: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze
17.SummaryEnglish: Shingo develops a crush on Ami during a trip to the beach, while Tiger's Eye plot to seduce her.

18.SummaryEnglish: It's a battle for best ballerina! Who can win? The stunning, beautiful but natural clumsy Usagi or the villionous Fish Eye?

19.SummaryEnglish: Usagi and Chibiusa are befriended by a mysterious foreign woman who accompanies them to the Azabu-Juuban summer festival. Unbeknownst to them, their acquaintance is a visiting princess who is being pursed by both her government and Hawk's Eye.

20.SummaryEnglish: Tiger's Eye plans to seduce the girls at a university dance party, while Makoto is immediately smitten with the charming stranger.

21.TitleEnglish: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance
21.SummaryEnglish: Zirconia gives Fish Eye the photo of a man to attack, and Fish Eye goes after the target. The target is Mamoru.

22.TitleEnglish: Mirrors of Dreams: The Amazon's Last Stage
22.SummaryEnglish: Fish Eye is devasted to learn that he will not get to be a human with beautiful dreams anymore after the next full moon. He poses as a female, and wants to be with Mamoru before he gets transported back to a fish. Mamoru is to loyal to Usagi to accept. Fish Eye still wins a kiss. Fish Eye is depressed about not getting his love, and winds up going to Usagi's house to seek shelter from the rain. He is shocked to find out, Usagi is Super Sailor Moon and best of all, Pegasus is in Chibiusa's care. Zirconia is ready to replace the Amazon Trio with the Amazon Quartet, and they send out a demon to berid of Tigers Eye, Hawks Eye and Fish Eye. The remaining 2/3's of the trio come down to Earth, and there they attack Usagi for her mirror. Fish Eye explains his wish of having dreams, and everyone agrees they want to be full human. The Quartet's demon attacks Fish Eye, but Hawks Eye saves him by stepping in the way, and is killed. With the power of Pegasus, the demon is killed but the full moon s

23.TitleEnglish: The Amazoness: Nightmare from Behind the Mirrors
23.SummaryEnglish: Zirconia sends the Amazoness Quartet in search of the Golden Mirror, and their first target is Chibiusa's friend Momoko.

24.TitleEnglish: True Power Explodes: Ami's Melody of the Heart
24.SummaryEnglish: Ami becomes obsessed with a tune she found on the internet, and writes lyrics to it. Meanwhile, VesVes of the Amazoness Quartet targets the tune's composer.

25.TitleEnglish: Flames of Passion: Mars's Raging Super Attack
25.SummaryEnglish: Usagi sees Rei on a cover of a popular magazine and sees that at the shrine she is overly popular. A little girl decides to dress up like Rei and help her. This girl idolizes Rei! Rei tells the other girls that she is annoyed by her, and she is sad and runs away. One of the Amazon Quartet girls takes her dream. Moon and team defeat the youma.

26.SummaryEnglish: Para-para is sent on a job to open a dentist job in order to steal dreams. Usagi and Chibiusa, along with many people, have cavities and go to that dentist. Mamo notices that many people come into the dentist place, but no one comes out. Usagi and Chibiusa are attacked and Mamo as Tuxedo Kamen goes to save them. Para-para is sad to know it has all failed. Ikuko sends the two girls to the Juuban Dentist because theit cavities are real!

27.TitleEnglish: Clash of Dreams: Minako and Makoto's Broken Friendship
27.SummaryEnglish: Makoto and Minako both fall for an attractive kindergarten teacher, but Minako's all-out attempts to ingratiate herself with him soon annoyed to Makoto.

28.TitleEnglish: Overcome Your Fear: The Jump to Freedom
28.SummaryEnglish: On the eve of his school's athletic meet, Kyuusuke worries about the box horse, the one obstacle he is unable to clear. JunJun approaches him with the intention of taking his Dream Mirror, and offers to be his coach.

29.TitleEnglish: Don't Lose Sight of Your Dreams: The Mirror of Truth
29.SummaryEnglish: Usagi and Chibiusa befriend Kamoi, a starving young artist, who is later targeted by CereCere.

30.SummaryEnglish: While VesVes targets an eccentric acquaintance of Chibiusa's who is trying to make a flying machine, Chibiusa worries that Pegasus does not trust her.

31.TitleEnglish: Pegasus's Secret: The Boy Who Protects the Dream World
31.SummaryEnglish: PallaPalla's magic causes Usagi and Chibiusa to switch ages, turning Usagi into a child and Chibiusa into a teenager. While Chibiusa is thrilled with her new body, she is distressed to discover that she can no longer call Pegasus.

32.SummaryEnglish: As Chibiusa becomes even more enamoured of Helios, Usagi and her friends realise that she is in love, and are determined to discover the identity of her crush.

33.TitleEnglish: Dream to Be an Adult: The Amazonesses' Confusion
33.SummaryEnglish: Usagi and her friends, along with the Amazoness Quartet, assist in the organization of a coming-of-age ceremony.

34.TitleEnglish: Terror in Motion: The Dark Queen's Evil Hand
34.SummaryEnglish: Intent on escaping her mirror, Queen Nehellenia causes spider webs to appear all over the city, casting it into darkness.

35.TitleEnglish: The Source of Darkness: Dead Moon Circus
35.SummaryEnglish: The Sailor Team infiltrate the Dead Moon Circus and are confronted by Zirconia.

36.TitleEnglish: Labyrinth of Mirrors: Chibi Moon Captured
36.SummaryEnglish: After being captured by Queen Nehellenia, Sailor Chibi Moon confronts the evil queen.

37.TitleEnglish: The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehellenia's Magic
37.SummaryEnglish: Queen Nehellenia forces Helios to return to his body and give up the Golden Crystal, allowing the evil queen to break free from her mirror.

38.TitleEnglish: When the Crystal Shines: The Beautiful Power of Dreams
38.SummaryEnglish: Queen Nehellenia, free from her mirror at last, prepares to use the power of the Golden Crystal.

39.TitleEnglish: Dreams Forever: Fill the Heavens with Light
39.SummaryEnglish: Queen Nehellenia makes a desperate last stand as the Golden Crystal destroys the Dead Moon Circus.

1.TitleEnglish: The Flower of Nightmares Scatters: The Queen of Darkness Returns
1.SummaryEnglish: Hotaru Tomoe has visions of Eternal Sailor Moon. Setsuna arrives at the Tomoe house to pick her up. The girls and Mamoru gather in the park to discover that Chibi-Usa is returning to the future. Meanwhile, Queen Nehelenia is freed from her mirrored prison by an unseen voice. As Chibi-Usa uses her time key to return to Crystal Tokyo with Diana, Nehelenia remembers the events that happened before she had been sealed in the mirror again and she produces her own soul-mirror. Angered, she breaks the mirror and shards fly everywhere. The Soldiers view the shards as shooting stars, but Mamoru recieves one of them in his eye as Chibi-Usa is about to step into the time portal. Unfortunately, the portal disappears leaving the girls puzzled. Later that night, many people gather at an aquarium, including Haruka and Michiru. Some of the nightmare shards land on the roof and form into Nehelenia's Mirror Paredories. Haruka and Michiru are surrounded when Dead Scream is used and Sailor Pluto appears.

2.TitleEnglish: Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite
2.SummaryEnglish: Michiru and Haruka are suprised to see that Hotaru has grown into her normal age, and Sailor Saturn appears. Neherina talks with Mamoru.

3.TitleEnglish: The Cursed Mirror: Mamoru Caught in a Nightmare
3.SummaryEnglish: When a mysterious affliction causes people in Tokyo to do nothing but stare into mirrors, the Sailor Soldiers race against time to try and save Mamoru from this mysterious new enemy.

4.TitleEnglish: Night of Destiny: The Sailor Guardians’ Ordeals
4.SummaryEnglish: Chibiusa is not doing so well after Mamoru is captured, she begins to disappear because without Mamoru she cannot exist.

5.TitleEnglish: For Love: The Endless Battle in the Dark World

6.TitleEnglish: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends
6.SummaryEnglish: Sailor Moon and friends finally defeat Neherina for good, and rescue Mamoru from her. Now everyone is okay, but Chibiusa and Diana decide to leave for the future for good.

7.TitleEnglish: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny
7.SummaryEnglish: With Neherina down, everything seems to be okay, that is until Galaxia and her animates show their ugly heads. Now, Sailor Moon and gang have another problem, the Sailor Starlights, friend or foe? Also, Usagi watches the departure of Mamoru who heads off to college in America.

8.TitleEnglish: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols
8.SummaryEnglish: Everyone at Usagi's school is excited that the Three Lights are transferring to Juuban High. Seiya gets Usagi to show him all the clubs in school. The football team's captain is turned into a phage named ""Sailor Guts"" by Iron Mouse. The other Inner Senshi are shocked to learn about the new soldiers.

9.SummaryEnglish: Minako becomes the Starlights assistant. Usagi also follows her. Sailor Tin Cat takes Saki's star seed. ESM and Venus soon restore it.

10.TitleEnglish: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation
10.SummaryEnglish: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical, which they will be starring in. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director, especially Seiya, who feels that he is being personally tested.

11.TitleEnglish: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation
11.SummaryEnglish: Ami invited Taiki to come and watch the Wataru's Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher, Amanogawa, only to be rejected.

12.TitleEnglish: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

13.TitleEnglish: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians
13.SummaryEnglish: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.

14.TitleEnglish: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru
14.SummaryEnglish: Usagi and the girls try to buy tockets to a Three Lights concert, only to learn it is already sold out. Michiru then passes by and gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be performing with the Three Lights.

15.SummaryEnglish: Seiya asks Usagi on a date, to which she reluctantly agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya's star seed.

16.TitleEnglish: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren
16.SummaryEnglish: Chibi Chibi arrives in this episode. Pluto tells the sailor scouts to just be on guard around her. Chibi Chibi, like Chibiusa, makes Usagi's family believe that she is Usagi's younger sister. Sailor Aluminum siren first appears in this episode. She takes a police guard's star seed, but it wasn't a real star seed. ESM and pluto arrive. ESM uses her starlight honeymoon therapy kiss to return him back to normal. At home, Usagi is dissappointed that she hasn't heard from Mamoru. Then chibi chibi comes in, Usagi asks if she wet her pants while sleeping. Chibi Chibi frowns, Usagi says she can sleep with her. They both fall asleep.

17.TitleEnglish: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster
17.SummaryEnglish: Siren turns a potter (Rei's cousin) into a phage after he destroys all his work. Usagi and the girls go camping and run into the Three Lights (they're filming in the area). They hear news of the ""Camp Ravager"" in the area. Seiya decides to scare the girls with the monster costume from their movie, but Usagi and Rei run into the phage instead. After transforming, Mars realizes it's her cousin and Usagi heals him.

18.TitleEnglish: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger
18.SummaryEnglish: With a rash of break-ins plaguing the neighborhood and the rest of the Tsukino family out of town, Seiya offers to stay over at Usagi's house in case anything happens. But when Seiya's bandmates from The Three Lights, the rest of the Sailor Soldiers, and even the evil Sailors Aluminum Seiren and Lead Crow all show up. Sailor Moon and the rest of the Sailor Soldiers have to fight a monster in the very crowded Tsukino household.

19.TitleEnglish: Taiki's Song Filled with Passion and Faith
19.SummaryEnglish: Taiki begins to question if their activity as the Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess. His frustration continues to grow, to the point where he no longer feels like singing.

20.TitleEnglish: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase
20.SummaryEnglish: Lately, Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with a lot of snacks. Curious to know where she's been getting all the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi around for the day.

21.TitleEnglish: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation
21.SummaryEnglish: Usagi finds herself teamed up with Seiya for the annual school softball tournament. To make matters worse, Isagi becomes a target of Seiya's fans, who think she is hitting on him.

22.TitleEnglish: Invitation to Terror: Usagi's Night Flight
22.SummaryEnglish: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Using this knowledge, she sets a trap on a plane where the Three Lights are holding an in-flight event in order to get Usagi's attention.

23.TitleEnglish: Duty or Friendship: Conflict Between the Sailor Guardians
23.SummaryEnglish: The Inner Senshi and the Starlights learn each others real identities, but distrust each other, Usagi and Seiya try to bring both groups together.

24.TitleEnglish: Truth Revealed: The Star Lights' Past
24.SummaryEnglish: Seiya and Usagi try to stay together after the Outer Senshi and the other two Starlights forbid them from seeing each other.

25.TitleEnglish: Butterflies of Light: A New Chapter on the Horizon
25.SummaryEnglish: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi but are unable to get in touch with them. As a last resort, the girls decide to enter a video game tournament where the winner gets a chance to speak with Taiki.

26.TitleEnglish: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol
26.SummaryEnglish: Minako finally gets her chance to audition to be an idol. She realizes that she has to chase her dreams, even in the middle of an attack by the animates.

27.TitleEnglish: The Stolen Silver Crystal: Princess Kakyu Appears
27.SummaryEnglish: Usagi and her classmates are all busy preparing for the upcoming Juban School Festival. Meanwhile, Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon's true identity.

28.TitleEnglish: Crusade for the Galaxy: Legend of the Sailor Wars
28.SummaryEnglish: Princess Kakyu, the missing princess whom the Star Lights have long been searching for, finally appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.

29.TitleEnglish: Princess Kakyu Perishes: Advent of Galaxia
29.SummaryEnglish: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she has been unable to get in touch with Mamoru for the past several months. Meanwhile, the Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband their group.

30.TitleEnglish: Countdown to Destruction: The Sailor Guardians' Last Battle
30.SummaryEnglish: The Sailor Scouts prepare for the final battle against Galaxia. They all transform and prepare to go to thw tower but there is a force filed around it. They think all they can do is watch Galaxia TV as Starlights are attacked by Galaxia. Then, a pink ball of light appears, its Chibu Chibi! She transports them into the tower. They are in front of Galaxia.The Sailor Senshi stand in front of Sailor moon but Galaxia blows them away and then shoots energy balls at them. One goes through each of the them in this order Mercury Venus Jupiter then Mars. Sailor Uranus, Neptune, Pluto, and Saturn cannot believe they are gone. Their star seeds appear and float towards Galaxia. Sailor Mercury, Venus, Jupiter, and Mars say their goodbye. Galaxia shows them all the star seeds she has, Sailor moon notices a golden one in back. It is Mamoru's(Tuxedo Mask's) star seed!

31.TitleEnglish: Ruler of the Galaxy: The Menace of Galaxia
31.SummaryEnglish: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia's attack. The four Outer Guardians entrust Sailor Moon to the Star Lights while they try to stop Galaxia.

32.TitleEnglish: Dying Stars: Uranus and Neptune's Last Stand
32.SummaryEnglish: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia. Despite Sailor Moon's desperate plea, the two continue their attack, forcing Sailor Moon and the Star Lights to retreat.

33.TitleEnglish: The Light of Hope: The Final Battle for the Galaxy
33.SummaryEnglish: Sailor Moon prepares for the final battle with Galaxia.

34.TitleEnglish: Usagi's Love: The Moonlight Illuminates the Galaxy
34.SummaryEnglish: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon's star seed, the Light of Hope finally reveals itself. Turning into a sword, the Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia, who is now fully consumed by Chaos.
